# ads.txt file for Google AdSense
# Replace YOUR_PUBLISHER_ID with your actual Google AdSense publisher ID
# Your publisher ID should look like: pub-1234567890123456
# You can find this in your Google AdSense account dashboard

# Additional ad networks can be added below if needed
# Format: domain.com, publisher_id, relationship_type, certification_authority_id
# Example: partnerad.com, pub-9876543210987654, RESELLER, f08c47fec0942fa0
